question: Siphon will fail to work if
option1: the densities of the liquid in the two vessels are equal
option2: the level of the liquid in the two vessels are at the same height
option3: both its limbs are of unequal length
option4: the temperature of the liquids in the two vessels are the same
answer: the level of the liquid in the two vessels are at the same height
